JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible — and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day. 
Function Description:
Enterprise Digital & Analytics team within GCSG is a dynamic environment of digital product and analytics professionals that drive significant value for American Express through innovative solutions. Membership Experience Product Analytics and Testing team with in EDA specializes in insightful and actionable analytics for customer facing digital products across Mobile Web, Mobile App, Digital Labs and Push channels. 
 
Purpose of the Role:
The Product Analytics & Testing (ME-Membership Engagement) team centralizes web, mobile and digital product analytics to support Enterprise Digital Membership Experience product teams across the enterprise. The focus of this team is to drive digital product evolution based on robust digital product analytics driven insights and robust test & learn and experimental analytics
Responsibilites:
This role will report to the Sr. Manager/Manager of Digital Analytics and will be part of the Enterprise Digital & Analytics team in Gurgaon. The candidate will be responsible for delivery of highly impactful analytics for Amex’s digital products and experiences.
Critical Factors to Success:
Knowledge of statistical software (SAS, SQL, Machine Learning) and manipulating large and complex data sets; experience with Teradata preferred 
Good Verbal & Written Communication skills and ability to articulate analytics recommendations to the business partners
Past Experience:
1-2 years+ analytics experience with a background in quantitative business analysis and statistical and modeling techniques; experience in digital analytics preferred 
Academic Background:
Post graduate degree in Business, Finance , Economics, Statistics or a related field from a premier institute
Functional Skills/Capabilities:
Deliver custom analytics and insights focused on the product and marketing roadmap for Amex chat products / Amex.com / Amex online account , Amex mobile app etc. 
Define and develop new KPIs, customer segmentation(s) and predictive models to drive “digital adoption and engagement” for all customer facing digital assets across American Express
Power in-depth strategic analysis and provide analytical and decision support by mining digital activity data and AXP closed loop data
Gain deep functional understanding of the digital assets over time and ensure analytical insights are relevant and actionable   
Design and analyze experiments to optimize digital membership journeys to deliver best on both business goals and customer experience
 
Technical Skills/Capabilities:
 
HIVE, SAS, Python, SQL
 
Knowledge of Platforms:
 
Cornerstone, Hadoop
 
Behavioral Skills/Capabilities:
Enterprise Leadership Behaviors
•            Set The Agenda: Define What Winning Looks Like, Put Enterprise Thinking First, Lead with an External Perspective
•            Bring Others With You: Build the Best Team, Seek & Provide Coaching Feedback, Make Collaboration Essential
•            Do It The Right Way: Communicate Frequently, Candidly & Clearly, Make Decisions Quickly & Effectively, Live the Blue Box Values, Great Leadership Demands Courage
